title: I am not receiving text messages. This is the 4th time this has happened since August. I
content: I am trying to figure out why I am not getting my texts messages. Thisb is the 4th time since August. I have done multiple factory resets. I've gotten a new motherboard, I've reset everything you can reset. And nothing works. All of a sudden about a week after I stop getting messages they all come back. Not sure what else to do.
